name: CircL
description:
----- GAMEPLAY -----

What would you do, what would you say just to survive?

This game is inspired by the movie The Circle (2015). Not the greatest movie but the concept was pretty cool.

The aim of the game is to be the last person standing by voting people out forging alliances, and targeting those who you think are your biggest competitors

Behind the scenes characters have love and hate stances against other character and they will also respond to how you act. This is all mixed in with a healthy amount of RNG and you get CircL.

----- CONTROLS -----

This game uses the mouse (left click only) to perform all actions. There are three ways to interact with the game:

- Vote:

Add to someone else's vote poll. You get one vote to spend each round (30 seconds). Keep in mind your vote is moveable until the last second.

- Action: Ally:

Attempt to form an alliance with another character. While allied they will not vote for you and are likely to also copy your votes.

- Action: Target:

Attempt to get everyone to vote for someone in particular. Keep in mind this can backfire if who you picked is more liked than you are!

Each round you get 1 vote and can take 1 action.

Have fun playing!
